sentence.Network_en: They have improved immeasurably since their arrival.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们自来到这里以后，有了很大改进。

sentence.Network_en: The situation today is immeasurably more acute than it was 25 years ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天的形势远比25年前严峻。

sentence.Network_en: Under his stewardship, the UN's repute has risen immeasurably.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他的管理下，联合国的声望得到了极大提升。

entry.def: You use immeasurably to emphasize the degree or extent of a process or quality.

example.ex: They have improved immeasurably since their arrival...
example.tran: 他们自来到这里以后,有了很大改进。

example.ex: The situation today is immeasurably more acute than it was 25 years ago.
example.tran: 今天的形势远比 25 年前严峻。

means.word_mean: 1. to an immeasurable degree; beyond measurement;

sentences.sentence: "the war left him immeasurably fearful of what man can do to man"

auth_sentence.content: But this year it is immeasurably grimmer than normal.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But this year it is immeasurably grimmer than normal.

auth_sentence.content: I am immeasurably better off on so many levels through meeting Victor.
